sentences.sContent: As you’d expect from a title like that, there will be a samurai group, numerous katanas and an evil Lord in need of a killing.
sentences.sContent_eng: As you’d expect from a title like that, there will be a samurai group, numerous katanas and an evil Lord in need of a killing.
sentences.sCn: 就如你看到片名时期待的那样，影片中会有一个武士团，许多武士刀和一个需要被除掉的邪恶藩主。

remMethod.val: 来自日语， 指推崇武士道的人

trans.tranOther: a member of a powerful military class in Japan in the past
